message: Let's split it fairly, no need to negotiate
You wanted to split it fairly? I'll give you a little less, but I'll still give you a good chunk!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go any higher!
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this!
I'm not getting any younger, I need a better deal now!
Fine, I'll meet you in the middle, but don't think this is the final offer!
I'm not budging, this is my final offer!
You said it's your final offer, but I'm not convinced. I'll give you a little more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
